statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (9,-2) and (6,-7).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{7}-{\left(-{2}\right)}}}{{{6}-{\left({9}\right)}}}=-\frac{{5}}{{-{{3}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{5}}{{3}} (if it's not already reduced)
